item.title: WATCH: Suspected drunk driver found sleeping behind the wheel on I-75
item.description: Deputies say the suspect’s breathalyzer reading was 0.325.

item.title: Pam Ames takes on Arcadia’s toughest job: Saving Main Street
item.description: Ames has helped beautify downtown, launch a golf tournament and organize business workshops.

item.title: ‘Nothing can hold me back’: High schooler scores touchdown on 1st play since open-heart surgery
item.description: A teenager returned to the football field for the first time since undergoing open-heart surgery.

item.title: One person sent to hospital in Sarasota structure fire
item.description: Sarasota County Fire Department respond to a structure fire

item.title: Adult who allegedly posed as high school student for 19 days calls situation a ‘misunderstanding’
item.description: A 22-year-old man who allegedly posed as a teen at a high school calls the situation a "misunderstanding."

item.title: Manatee County trash pickup changes start Oct. 6
item.description: Beginning Oct. 6, a new solid waste collection schedule will take effect.

item.title: Universal to reopen Stardust Racers roller coaster ride 2 weeks after man’s death
item.description: Universal Orlando Resort plans to reopen its Stardust Racers ride at Epic Universe on Saturday.

item.title: Closures across I-275 today
item.description: Today from 5 a.m. to 10 p.m., travelers on I-275 should expect delays.
